openai.setupInstructions: To use Interflow's AI features, you need to set up your OpenAI API key. Follow the instructions below to get your key.
openai.howToGetKey: How to get an OpenAI API key:
openai.step1: Visit the OpenAI website and log in to your account (or create a new one)
openai.step2: Navigate to the 'API Keys' section in the dashboard
openai.step3: Click on 'Create new secret key' and give your key a name
openai.step4: Copy the generated key (you'll only see it once) and use it in Interflow
openai.step5: Add a payment method to your OpenAI account to use the API
openai.paymentRequired: Important: You need to add a valid payment method to your OpenAI account to use the API, even for the free tier.

s3.setupInstructions: To use S3 storage, you need to set up your AWS credentials. Follow the instructions below to get your keys.
s3.howToGetKey: How to get your AWS S3 credentials:
s3.step1: Access the AWS Management Console and log in to your account
s3.step2: Navigate to the IAM (Identity and Access Management) service
s3.step3: Create a new user with permissions to access S3 or use an existing one
s3.step4: Generate a new access key and note down the Access Key ID and Secret Access Key
s3.step5: Create an S3 bucket or use an existing one and note down the name and region
